title: Voxic Shock: Whiskey Zulu India
author: VD
content_html: In which I revisit scenario Whiskey Zulu India with the help of my producer, Vidad. In related news, Greece appears to be in full meltdown. Consider the current yields for the 2-year bond. Today: 55.388%. Last week: 32.766%. Last year: 10.576%. As the Market Ticker has warned, it looks very much as if a Lehman event is on the way.
content_text: In which I revisit scenario Whiskey Zulu India with the help of my producer, Vidad.  In related news, Greece appears to be in full meltdown.  Consider the current yields for the 2-year bond.  Today: 55.388%.  Last week: 32.766%.  Last year: 10.576%.  As the Market Ticker has warned, it looks very much as if a Lehman event is on the way.
